snippet.title: File://Maniac - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Release Date: April 27th, 2019 on itch.io: https://born-frustrated.itch.io/

Join Our Discord: https://discord.gg/hjKtTzu

File://maniac is a puzzle game where the interactions are made in the directory of the game. Explore the game folders, move and modify the files trying to find the criminal mind that created the “game”. The game is the pilot episode of a series set in a cyberpunk future where a special investigative division of the police performs extensive research on the profiles of criminal minds by sending agents into their subconscious.

Follow the final development steps of File://Maniac, fill the form and keep in touch!
https://bornfrustratedstudio.com/filemaniac/
